steps.title: My Designation Master functions as a curated list of designations that MDO admins/leaders have designated as relevant to their organisation's needs.
You can select from a broader pool of designations available on the iGOT master platform.
You can also expedite the process by utilizing designations already declared or verified by users within your organisation.

frameworkCreationMSg: Please hold on while the designation master is being generated. This process will take approximately 1 minute. You can continue exploring other features of the MDO portal during this time.
associationUpdateMsg: Designation is being mapped to the organization.
associationRetryMsg: An error occurred while mapping the designation to the organization. Retrying...
internalErrorMsg: An internal error occurred. Please try again later.

sampleFileDownloadInstructuons.title: Follow these steps to upload multiple designations:
instructions: Fill in the details in the Sample File.
Upload the populated sample csv file.
Check the upload results for confirmation.
